titleStmt.title: Cloria and Narcissus a delightfull and new romance, imbellished with divers politicall notions and singular remarks of moderne transactions / written by an honourable person.
Cloria and Narcissus.
titleStmt.author: Honourable person.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. G. and are to be sold by Anth. Williamson ...,

notesStmt.note: Vol. 2 has title: Cloria and Narcissus continued ... London, 1654.
Published later under title: The princess Cloria, or, The royal romance.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
